# polytomic_global_error_subscribers (Resource)

Global error subscribers

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "polytomic_global_error_subscribers" "example" {
  emails = [
    "alerts@example.com",
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `emails` (Set of String) Email addresses to notify for global errors

### Optional

- `organization` (String) Organization ID (required when using partner or deployment keys)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Resource identifier
